document_data.mainbody: '''wildlife of [[Cormanthor]]''' was vast and diverse, encompassing many different types of flora and fauna. Listed below are some of the various kinds of plant and animal life found within the great forest.

*[[Antelope]] (rimwood, midwood)
*[[Badger]] (any)
